title: Consider changing multi-term queries to use CONSTANT_SCORE_AUTO_REWRITE_DEFAULT
description: They are CONSTANT_SCORE_AUTO_REWRITE_DEFAULT now, but ConstantScoreBooleanQueryRewrite can be faster and CONSTANT_SCORE_AUTO_REWRITE_DEFAULT is likely the best setting.
